name: Neuroticism is the Enemy of Progress...
name_original: Neuroticism is the Enemy of Progress...
description:
Text based choose your own adventure. 

Created for Refresher Indie Videogame Refresher 2019 in two days (https://library.yarracity.vic.gov.au/featured-events/2019/11/09/refresh-video-games-weekender).

Please leave feedback and comments, and the goal of this was to improve writing and craft.

Created by Robert Barry
